title._content: [Sergeant William T. Biedler, 16 years old, of Company C, Mosby's Virginia Cavalry Regiment with musket] (LOC)

description._content: [Sergeant William T. Biedler, 16 years old, of Company C, Mosby's Virginia Cavalry Regiment with musket] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : ninth-plate ambrotype, hand-colored ; 7.8 x 6.8 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Berg, no. 3-344. Deposit; Tom Liljenquist; 2011; (D 062). Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Subjects: Biedler, William T.,--1844-1897.
